name: 郭志宇
objective: The course is designed for chemical engineering major. The topics explore chemistry at a greater depth and with more emphasis on concepts, problems, and calculations. Topics include gases, solutions, chemical reaction, oxidation-reduction reaction, chemical kinetics, chemical equilibrium, acids and bases, and introduction of organic chemistry.

9th    Reaction Rates and Chemical Equilibrium
10th    Acids and Bases

13th  Introduction to Organic Chemistry: Hydrocarbons
14th  Alcohols, Phenols, Thiols, and Ethers
15th  Aldehydes and Ketones
16th  Aldehydes and Ketones
17th  Second Midterm Exam
18th  Presentation
